text: ( Source : Akin Gump Strauss Hauer & Feld LLP ) This week, we highlight PricewaterhouseCooper's (PwC) 2015 Annual Corporate Directors Survey . During the summer of 2015, 783 public company directors responded PwC's survey. The survey was
